---
title: "Flexidashboard of NYC Restaurant Inspections"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
data("rest_inspec")
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
plot_2=
rest_inspec %>% 
  group_by(record_date)%>%
  count(cuisine_description) %>% 
  mutate(cuisine_description = fct_reorder(cuisine_description, n)) %>% 
  filter(cuisine_description!="Missing")%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=record_date,y=n,color=cuisine_description))+
  geom_line()+
  ggtitle("Number of Violations Over Time for Different Cuisines")+
  xlab("Date of Violation")+
  ylab("Number of Violations")+
  guides(fill=guide_legend(title="Type of Cuisine"))

ggplotly(plot_2)

```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
plot_1=
rest_inspec %>% 
  count(boro) %>% 
  mutate(boro = fct_reorder(boro, n)) %>% 
  filter(boro!="Missing")%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=boro,y=n,fill=boro))+
  geom_bar(stat="identity")+
  ggtitle("Number of Violations Per NYC Borough")+
  xlab("New York City Borough")+
  ylab("Number of Violations")+
  guides(fill=guide_legend(title="Borough"))

ggplotly(plot_1)
```
